summary: This bill, HR 5187, proposes the establishment of a program within the Department of Defense to support the expansion of domestic bioindustrial manufacturing capacity. The Secretary of Defense may provide awards to eligible entities for establishing, upgrading, and retooling bioindustrial manufacturing facilities that produce critical biomanufactured products. The bill outlines award criteria, reporting requirements, and a sunset clause. The Secretary is required to submit reports to Congress regarding the program's activities.
